cu.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum value 'invalid_choice' will cause ASN.1 parsing errors and configuration loading failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 0 will disable MIMO functionality and cause physical layer transmission errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 0 會停用 MIMO 功能，並造成物理層傳輸錯誤。
